getEditableConfigMacros

public java.util.List getEditableConfigMacros(User adminUser)
Get the list of ConfigMacro classes that are used to store the Monitoring configuration.

Parameters:
adminUser - User who is requesting the config, checked to make sure they have either the MONITORING_ADMIN or ORG_ADMIN roles.
Returns:
List of com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.config.ConfigMacro objects, Collections.EMPTY_LIST if User doesnt have ORG_ADMIN

restartMonitoringServices

public boolean restartMonitoringServices(User userIn)
Restarts the Monitoring services. WARNING: This calls Runtime.exec() to restart the services.

Parameters:
userIn - user who wants to restart the sat, must be ORG_ADMIN
Returns:
did we restart

removeServerFromSuite

public void removeServerFromSuite(ProbeSuite suiteIn,
                                  Server serverIn,
                                  User userIn)
This deletes Server from this ProbeSuite. Deletes the assocation between this ProbeSuite and the Server as well as deletes ALL the Probes in this Suite from this Server.

Parameters:
suiteIn - probesuite that we want to remove the server from.
serverIn - Server to add to the ProbeSuite.
userIn - who is adding the suite

detatchServerFromSuite

public void detatchServerFromSuite(ProbeSuite suiteIn,
                                   Server serverIn,
                                   User userIn)
Convenience method to detach a Server from this ProbeSuite. This makes all the Probes assigned to the Server only.

Parameters:
suiteIn - probesuite that we want to detatch the server from.
serverIn - Server to add to the ProbeSuite.
userIn - who is adding the suite

filtersInOrg

public DataResult filtersInOrg(Org orgIn,
                               PageControl pc,
                               boolean active)
List the notification Filters in the Org. Returns the list of Maps with 3 fields: name, type, expiration.

Parameters:
orgIn - Org we want to fetch the Suites for
pc - PageControl
active - if we want to show active filters or expired filters (false).
Returns:
the probe suites for orgIn

Parameters:
group - the group for which to return the commands
Returns:
a list of all the Command objects in the given group

systemsNotInSuite

public DataResult systemsNotInSuite(User currentUser,
                                    ProbeSuite suiteIn,
                                    PageControl pc)

Parameters:
currentUser - of the site
suiteIn - current ProbeSuite we want to look up against.
pc - pageControl we are using
Returns:
DataResult of SystemOverview DTOs

probesForSystem

public DataResult<ServerProbeDto> probesForSystem(User currentUser,
                                                  Server serverIn,
                                                  PageControl pc)
Get the Probes running against a system. Much faster than Hibernate.

Parameters:
currentUser - who is requesting the probes
serverIn - who's probes you want to see
pc - for pagnation. Null if you want them all.
Returns:
DataResult of ServerProbeDto objects

probesForSystemWithAlerts

                                            Server serverIn,
                                            PageControl pc)

Parameters:
currentUser - who is requesting the probes
serverIn - who's probes you want to see
pc - for pagnation. Null if you want them all.
Returns:
DataResult of ServerProbeDto objects

systemsInSuite

public DataResult systemsInSuite(User currentUser,
                                 ProbeSuite suiteIn,
                                 PageControl pc)
Get the Systems assigned to the passed in ProbeSuite. Much faster than using Hibernate.

Parameters:
currentUser - who is requesting the systems
suiteIn - who you want to get the servers for
pc - for pagination. Null if you want them all.
Returns:
DataResult of MonitoredServerDto objects.

user - making the query

listProbeStateSummary

public DataResult listProbeStateSummary(User user)
Get summary of the probe states in the DB. Returns 2 column result with COUNT, STATE: 22 , CRITICAL 1 , OK 20 , WARNING ....

Parameters:
user - making the query See MonitoringConstants.PROBE_STATE_*
Returns:
DataResult list of Maps.
